description: This file sets up an agent with a Claude model and DuckDuckGo tools to analyze an image and perform a web search.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent configured with a model and tools to perform tasks.

classes.name: Image
classes.description: Represents an image with a URL.

classes.name: Claude
classes.description: A model class for the Claude AI model.

classes.name: DuckDuckGoTools
classes.description: Tools for web searching via DuckDuckGo.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Sends a prompt to the agent and outputs the response, optionally with images and streaming.
